block.name: Auto-Correlator
block.doc: This block is the numerical calculation of the fast auto-correlation block previously available in gr-baz. It uses the Wiener Khinchin theorem that the FFT of a signal's power spectrum is its auto-correlation function. FAC Size controls the FFT size and therefore the length of time (samp_rate/fac_size) the auto-correlation runs over. While a separate block provides an all-in-one sink, this can be fed into a vector-to-stream then into a time sink block for display.
